channel.title: Need A Server Hoster -.- Last 1 Screwed Me Over :O
channel.description:
Yea....
I need some 1 that can host my server 24/7. The last guy scamed me and took the source, and trashed the forums >:(
So if you could host a server for me please. The source download page is: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JWK25G7Q
You have to have:
[ul][li]Make It A No-Ip[/li] [li]Have An Auto Restarter[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Be Able To Keep It On 24/7 With No Lagg Comig from You Computer[/li][/ul]
Thanks .::[glow=red,2,300][/glow]LiAm::.
